title: Conjunctions Grammar Guide
description: Comprehensive guide covering conjunctions used in professional contexts with examples from various industries

basic_concepts.definition: Conjunctions are words that connect words, phrases, clauses, or sentences, showing the relationship between the connected elements and helping to create coherent and logical communication.

examples.description: Connects similar ideas or adds information
Shows contrast or opposition between ideas
